::Feline::

She stood up on shakey legs and looked at the three.  Her body 
glisened in the sunlight.  She sighed heavily. "I need a new skin. 
But how can I get one?"

She wondered if she could get her old one back, or if she would have 
to get a new form altogether. She did have an idea, perhaps a cheeta 
might suffice for a new form.  But DNA wasn't readily available and 
she felt her spark sink a bit.
